name: walleye
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large dark yellow or light green fish that lives in rivers in North America, or the flesh of these fish eaten as food: A walleye's diet consists mainly of other fish. They like to pan-fry fillets of walleye in breadcrumbs and serve them with a creamy sauce. There is a group of guys in the village who go fishing for walleye at night. The freezer was packed with fish, including five walleyes.
More examplesFewer examplesWalleye is usually fried but you should try baking it with mushrooms.You will often find walleye on the menu in restaurants in this part of Canada.
